programme.desc: When historian Jessica is hired to create the Plaza's Christmas display, she finds more than facts while teaming up with handsome decorator Nick to bring the display to life.

programme.title: Santa Tell Me
programme.desc: A design show host finds a letter from Santa promising to meet her true love, a man named Nick, by Christmas Eve. Meeting three Nicks complicates her search.

programme.title: Checkin' It Twice
programme.desc: Sparks fly between a hockey player and a real estate agent after he moves into a cottage in her family's backyard.

programme.title: Scouting for Christmas
programme.desc: A single mom tries to make her daughter's Christmas special since her dad is working overseas for the holidays. She partners with her daughter's favorite baker for the Holiday Ball.

programme.title: A Royal Corgi Christmas
programme.desc: The prince's Christmas gift for his mother, a corgi puppy, turns into a disaster when the dog misbehaves constantly. He turns to an American dog trainer for assistance and sparks begin to fly.

programme.title: Christmas She Wrote
programme.desc: When a writer has her column canceled right before Christmas, she heads home to reconnect with her family, only to receive an unexpected visit from the man who canceled her column.

programme.title: Pride, Prejudice and Mistletoe
programme.desc: When Darcy returns to her hometown for Christmas, and she reconnects with Luke, a former rival, they must plan a charity event together. As she spends time with her family and Luke, she starts to realize what matters most in life.

programme.title: Christmas Getaway
programme.desc: After a surprising breakup with her boyfriend, a travel writer decides to go on the picturesque Christmas vacation planned for the two of them, alone.

programme.title: A Nashville Christmas Carol
programme.desc: A workaholic television producer receives a visit from her recently deceased mentor, who warns her that her current path leads to a dark future.

programme.title: A Christmas Together With You
programme.desc: Planning on spending the holidays alone, Megan and her father figure, Frank, go on a road trip to find his first true love.

programme.title: A Fabled Holiday
programme.desc: Talia and her childhood best friend unexpectedly reunite in a curiously familiar-looking town that's full of Christmas spirit.

programme.title: The Christmas Contest
programme.desc: Sparks fly between a former couple as they compete in a Christmas contest to win money for the charity of their choosing.

programme.title: 'Tis the Season to Be Merry
programme.desc: Looking for a fresh angle for her book on relationships, Merry heads to snow-covered Vermont. She soon finds a new perspective and Christmas cheer when she meets a charismatic aid worker named Chris.

programme.title: Trivia at St. Nick's
programme.desc: Locals compete in a Christmas bar trivia tournament at the end of the semester.

programme.title: Coyote Creek Christmas
programme.desc: An event planner discovers Christmas magic with a charming father-son duo while throwing a themed Christmas party at her family's inn.

programme.title: Everything Christmas
programme.desc: A woman and her roommate embark on a road trip to Yuletide Springs, a town where Christmas is celebrated year-round.

programme.title: The Nine Kittens of Christmas
programme.desc: Cat lovers Zachary and Marilee are thrown back together at Christmastime when they're tasked with finding homes for a litter of adorable kittens.

programme.title: Coming Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Lizzie Richfield lands a job as house manager for the exquisite Ashford Estate in the Virginia countryside. While preparing the place for sale, Lizzie plans one final Christmas Eve gala for the family, although they seem to be a family in name only.

programme.title: A Tale of Two Christmases
programme.desc: Thanks to some holiday magic, Emma gets to experience two different Christmases -- one where she stays in the city and celebrates with a new crush and his friends, and one where she returns home for all the traditions with her family.

programme.title: A Very Merry Mix-Up
programme.desc: A woman plans to meet her future in-laws at Christmas and, through a serendipitous series of events, spends the holiday with a warm and caring family whose son catches her eye.

programme.title: Jolly Good Christmas
programme.desc: While searching for a Christmas gift for his girlfriend, an American architect in London crosses paths with a professional shopper and enlists her help to find the perfect gift.

programme.title: Holiday Mismatch
programme.desc: New retiree Barb joins a Holiday Committee but clashes with long standing member Kath. When they realize their kids have started dating, they conspire to break up the happy couple.

programme.title: Haul Out the Holly
programme.desc: Emily comes home to visit her parents, only to discover they're leaving for a trip of their own. While staying at their house for the holidays, Emily meets members of the community who want her to join in the neighborhood's Christmas festivities.

programme.title: Let It Snow
programme.desc: An executive examines her company's new property and prepares a presentation to transform the rustic lodge into a new hot spot. She tries to ignore the lodge's festive celebrations during her stay, but an unexpected romance changes her heart.

programme.title: Christmas Next Door
programme.desc: Eric Randall, an author of bachelor lifestyle books, is left in charge of his young niece and nephew for the holidays. Unsure of himself, Eric turns to his neighbor April, a lover of all things Christmas, for help.

programme.title: A Cozy Christmas Inn
programme.desc: A real estate executive travels to Alaska during the holidays to acquire a bed-and-breakfast, only to discover it's owned by her ex. She's soon falling in love with the town and quite possibly him all over again.

programme.title: The Christmas Secret
programme.desc: A struggling single mother (Bethany Joy Lenz) searches for a lost family heirloom that she hopes will bring her love and good fortune in time for the holidays.

programme.title: We Need a Little Christmas
programme.desc: Facing her first Christmas as a single mother, Julie develops an unexpected friendship with an older neighbor.

programme.title: Time for Me to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Two strangers, a businesswoman and a country music star, are both booked on a flight to Tulsa before the holidays, but it ends up getting canceled due to a snowstorm. They decide to try to get to Tulsa together, and share their secrets along the way.

programme.title: A Blue Ridge Mountain Christmas
programme.desc: Hotel manager Willow returns to her stunning Virginia hometown to help her sister plan a Christmas wedding at the inn her family once owned.

programme.title: Christmas Sail
programme.desc: When Liz returns home to take care of her estranged father, she is determined to give her daughter a perfect Christmas.

programme.title: Open by Christmas
programme.desc: When Nicky finds an unopened Christmas card from an old secret admirer, she and her best friend embark on a quest to find the anonymous author.

programme.title: It's Beginning to Look a Lot Like Christmas
programme.desc: When a New England Christmas decorating competition searches for the town with the most Christmas spirit, the mayors of East and West Riverton go all out to get their towns to the top of the holiday heap.

programme.title: The Santa Stakeout
programme.desc: Two police detectives posing as newlyweds to solve recent holiday party heists are swept up by Christmas while observing the prime suspect.

programme.title: A Christmas Carousel
programme.desc: Lila is hired by the royal family of Ancadia to repair a carousel and must work with the prince to complete it by Christmas.

programme.title: Jingle Bell Bride
programme.desc: A wedding planner finds romance with a handsome local after traveling to a remote town in Alaska to find a rare flower for a celebrity client.

programme.title: Every Christmas Has a Story
programme.desc: While on air, a TV personality accidentally admits she hates Christmas. When she goes to a small town to film a special to repair her image, the Christmas spirit begins to change her life.

programme.title: Small Town Christmas
programme.desc: Nell's last stop on a nationwide book tour takes her to Springdale, the hometown of Emmett, a young man she met while both were junior copy editors at a New York publishing company.

programme.title: This Time Each Year
programme.desc: Despite a trial separation, Lauren pretends to still be with her husband, Kevin, to placate her overbearing mother. The ruse may be just what the couple needs to finally work on their marriage.

programme.title: Time for Us to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Five guests are mysteriously invited to an inn to celebrate Christmas and soon investigate their connection to each other.

programme.title: Christmas on My Mind
programme.desc: Lucy Lovett wakes up holding a wedding dress and assumes she is about to marry the love her life, Zach Callahan.

programme.title: A Timeless Christmas
programme.desc: A man travels from 1903 to 2020, where he meets a tour guide at his historic mansion and gets to experience a 21st century Christmas.

programme.title: Road to Christmas
programme.desc: Los Angeles television producer Maggie Baker unwittingly falls for Danny Wise, the son and former producer of his mother's popular annual Christmas special.

programme.title: Return to Christmas Creek
programme.desc: After being told her new holiday app lacked Christmas spirit, a young CEO returns to her hometown to rediscover the meaning of the holidays.

programme.title: Debbie Macomber's Dashing Through the Snow
programme.desc: A young woman becomes stranded in an airport at Christmastime and accepts a ride from a man who rented the last rental car in town. As they head north, a hint of romance develops when they encounter a few bumps on the road.

programme.title: Merry & Bright
programme.desc: Merry and Bright Candy Cane Company owner Cate meets a man during the busy Christmas season and assumes he is the suitor her mother is trying to set her up with.

programme.title: My Sweet Austrian Holiday
programme.desc: Charlotte inherits a chocolate shop from her grandparents but soon finds herself in a battle with a large developer who wants to buy the building to turn it into an exclusive shopping boutique.

programme.title: A Glenbrooke Christmas
programme.desc: As Christmas nears, heiress Jessica Morgan seizes what seems like her last chance to experience a relaxed Christmas and heads off to the small town of Glenbrooke, where she meets a handsome fireman.

programme.title: A Little Christmas Charm
programme.desc: A jewelry designer teams up with an investigative reporter to find the owner of a charm bracelet before Christmas Eve.

programme.title: The Christmas Promise
programme.desc: Nicole learns to deal with grief, with the help of her grandfather and a carpenter she hires to renovate the home that was once meant for her and her fiancé.

programme.title: A Season for Family
programme.desc: Maddy's adopted son, Wesley, has just one wish for Christmas -- to meet his brother, Cody, who was adopted into a different family. Circumstances soon bring the two siblings together while sparks fly between their respective parents.

programme.title: A Novel Noel
programme.desc: A NYC book editor takes on a temporary gig running a Maine bookstore. Battling with the owners' son, she rediscovers her passion for nurturing creativity.

programme.title: Hardwood Classics
programme.sub-title: Phoenix Suns at New Jersey Nets
programme.desc: Phoenix Suns - 161 & New Jersey Nets - 151 in double overtime, from Dec. 7, 2006.

programme.title: Vince Carter: The Interview
programme.desc: Vince Carter, an eight-time NBA All-Star, sits down for an exclusive one-on-one interview and discusses his 2000 Slam Dunk performance, his playing days with the Toronto Raptors, and more.

programme.title: Hardwood Classics
programme.sub-title: 2014: Charlotte Bobcats at New York Knicks
programme.desc: From Jan. 24, 2014.

programme.desc: Beograd, Atina, Istanbul... Gradovi koji imaju veliku košarkašku tradiciju i po dva Evroligaša. Priča o najvećim rivalstvima evropskih klubova i kako svi od igrača do lokalaca te mečeve doživljavaju.

programme.title: Košarka - Kvalifikacije za AmeriCup: Paraguay - Panama
programme.desc: Počinje novi ciklus kvalifikacija za kontinentalna takmičenja. I dok se vremena menjaju, odnosi na relaciji FIBA, NBA i Evroliga ostaju isti... (LIVE).

programme.title: Odbojka - Italijanska liga (ž): Bergamo - Chieri
programme.desc: Kao i kod muške odbojkaške lige u Italiji, ženska odbojkaška liga se smatra jednom od najkvalitetnijih takmičenja na svetu. Pravi ljubitelji odbojke sigurno neće propustiti ovo takmičenje!

programme.title: Uži izbor
programme.desc: Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova. Na istom mestu, u isto vreme, kako ih uporediti i kako napraviti večne liste. Neko će probati ono o čemu se decenijama priča...

programme.title: Košarka - Australijska liga: Illawarra - Sydney
programme.desc: Nema boljeg načina da se počne dan nego uz australijsku košarku. Uzeli su medalju na Olimpijskim igrama, hale su pune i napreduju iz godine u godinu.

programme.title: Fudbal - Kvalifikacije za SP (Azija): Bahrain - Australia
programme.desc: Bliži se Svetsko prvenstvo i sve je manje prostora za grešku u kvalifikacijama. Mi smo na svim kontinentima i pratimo sva dešavanja.

programme.title: Odbojka - Poljska liga: Zawiercie - Zaksa
programme.desc: Pratimo mečeve najvišeg ranga odbojkaškog takmičenja u Poljskoj! Ova liga je svrstana među najbolje odbojkaške lige u Evropi, a u njoj se za svoje mesto bore najbolji klubovi te zemlje.

programme.title: Američki koledž fudbal: Florida - LSU
programme.desc: Koledž fudbal je američki fudbal koji igraju timovi sportista-studenata u okviru američkih koledža, univerziteta i vojnih akademija. Univerzitetski fudbal je jedna stepenica niže u odnosu na...

programme.title: Košarka - Španska liga: Tenerife - Manresa
programme.desc: Španska košarkaška ACB liga osnovana je 1957. godine kao "Liga National". U ligi sudeluje 18 ekipa prema dvokružnom sistemu takmičenja.

programme.title: Rukomet - Mađarska liga: Ferencvaros - Gyor
programme.desc: Počeci najvažnije rukometne lige u Mađarskoj sežu iz 1951. Održava se pod pokroviteljstvom Mađarske rukometne federacije i jedna je od najjačih u Evropi.

programme.title: Rivalitet legendi
programme.desc: Vukli su jedni druge napred, uvek je neki rivalitet izdizao sport na lestvicu više. Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova.

programme.title: Košarka - Grčka liga: Kolossos - Panathinaikos
programme.desc: Pratite prenose Grčke lige, prestižnog takmičenja čije je prvo izdanje održano u sezoni 1927/1928. Takmičenje svake sezone okuplja 12 klubova, a ubedljivo najuspešnija ekipa od osnivanja lige je...

programme.title: Fudbal - Kvalifikacije za SP (Azija): UAE - Qatar
programme.desc: Bliži se Svetsko prvenstvo i sve je manje prostora za grešku u kvalifikacijama. Mi smo na svim kontinentima i pratimo sva dešavanja.

programme.title: Odbojka - Italijanska liga (M): Piacenza - Trentino
programme.desc: Što je u košarci NBA, to je u odbojci italijanska liga. Svaki meč je spektakl, a mnogi vrednuju ovu titulu više od nekog evropskog trofeja.

programme.title: Fudbal - Kvalifikacije za SP (Azija): Indonesia - Saudi Arabia
programme.desc: Bliži se Svetsko prvenstvo i sve je manje prostora za grešku u kvalifikacijama. Mi smo na svim kontinentima i pratimo sva dešavanja.

programme.title: Pregled španske košarke
programme.desc: Donosimo pregled mečeva i klipove najboljih trenutaka iz Endese, najjače košarkaške lige Španije.

programme.title: Omaž zvezdama
programme.desc: Bokseri, fudbaleri, košarkaši... Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova. Na istom mestu, u isto vreme, kako ih uporediti i kako napraviti večne liste.

programme.title: Američki koledž fudbal: Georgia - Tennessee
programme.desc: Koledž fudbal je američki fudbal koji igraju timovi sportista-studenata u okviru američkih koledža, univerziteta i vojnih akademija. Univerzitetski fudbal je jedna stepenica niže u odnosu na...

programme.title: Fudbal - Kvalifikacije za SP (Azija): Kyrgyzstan - Iran
programme.desc: Bliži se Svetsko prvenstvo i sve je manje prostora za grešku u kvalifikacijama. Mi smo na svim kontinentima i pratimo sva dešavanja.

programme.title: Uži izbor
programme.desc: Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova. Na istom mestu, u isto vreme, kako ih uporediti i kako napraviti večne liste. Neko će probati ono o čemu se decenijama priča...

programme.title: Košarka - Španska liga: Murcia - Breogan
programme.desc: Španska košarkaška ACB liga osnovana je 1957. godine kao "Liga National". U ligi sudeluje 18 ekipa prema dvokružnom sistemu takmičenja.

programme.title: Košarka - Nemačka liga: Ulm - Gottingen
programme.desc: Iz godine u godinu, Bundesliga je jača. Zna se da su Alba i Bajern uvek moćni, ali sada imaju i žestoku konkurenciju.

programme.title: Fudbal - Kvalifikacije za SP (Azija): China - Japan
programme.desc: Bliži se Svetsko prvenstvo i sve je manje prostora za grešku u kvalifikacijama. Mi smo na svim kontinentima i pratimo sva dešavanja.

programme.title: Fudbal - Liga nacija CONCACAF: 1/4 Finale (2nd leg): USA - Jamaica
programme.desc: Karibi imaju nacije koje su u fudbalskom usponu. Ova nova Liga Nacija koju je napravio Konkakaf sigurno će im pomoći da nastave sa usponom.

programme.title: ATP Uncovered
programme.desc: Teniseri su gotovo celu godinu na putovanjima. Saznajte nešto više o tome kako izgleda njihov život na terenu i van njega i kako organizatori ATP turnira rešavaju slatke i gorke muke koje imaju.

programme.title: Fudbal - Kvalifikacije za SP (Azija): Oman - Iraq
programme.desc: Bliži se Svetsko prvenstvo i sve je manje prostora za grešku u kvalifikacijama. Mi smo na svim kontinentima i pratimo sva dešavanja.

programme.title: Rivalitet legendi
programme.desc: Vukli su jedni druge napred, uvek je neki rivalitet izdizao sport na lestvicu više. Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova.

programme.title: Košarka (M) - Kvalifikacije za Kup Azije: China - Guam
programme.desc: Počinje novi ciklus kvalifikacija za kontinentalna takmičenja. I dok se vremena menjaju, odnosi na relaciji FIBA, NBA i Evroliga ostaju isti… (LIVE).

programme.title: Trans World Sport
programme.desc: Interesantne priče i neobični sportovi iz svih delova sveta. Uvek ćete biti u toku uz ovu emisiju.

programme.title: Fudbal - Kvalifikacije za SP (Azija): North Korea - Uzbekistan
programme.desc: Bliži se Svetsko prvenstvo i sve je manje prostora za grešku u kvalifikacijama. Mi smo na svim kontinentima i pratimo sva dešavanja.

programme.title: Zlatni golovi YU sporta
programme.desc: Mnogo je velikih momenata u istoriji jugoslovenskog fudbala, a mi smo izdvojili samo najbolje od najboljeg. Uvek je lepo setiti se tih lepih trenutaka.

programme.title: Pregled Jedrenje: Vendee Globe
programme.desc: Vendée Globe je jedna od najzahtevnijih regata za jedriličare na svetu. U ovom takmičenju jedriličari su sami na svojim plovilima u trci oko sveta.

programme.title: Košarka (M) - Kvalifikacije za EP: North Macedonia - Lithuania
programme.desc: 41 evropska košarkaška reprezentacija bori se preko kvalifikacija za 24 mesta koje vodi na Evropsko košarkaško prvenstvo. (LIVE).

programme.title: Na današnji dan
programme.desc: Podsećanje na godišnjice uspeha sportista, klubova i reprezentacije koji su se dogodili na današnji dan.

programme.title: Košarka - Euroleague: Olympiacos - Baskonia
programme.desc: Najjače klupsko takmičenje u košarci na području Evrope svake sezone privlači pažnju velikog broja zaljubljenika košarku. Kao takmičenje visokog kvaliteta verujemo da će privući vašu pažnju. (LIVE).

programme.title: Omaž zvezdama
programme.desc: Bokseri, fudbaleri, košarkaši... Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova. Na istom mestu, u isto vreme, kako ih uporediti i kako napraviti večne liste.

programme.desc: Bliži se Svetsko prvenstvo i sve je manje prostora za grešku u kvalifikacijama. Mi smo na svim kontinentima i pratimo sva dešavanja.

programme.title: Moto GP Barcelona II: Moto 2: TRKA
programme.desc: Pratite napeto takmičenje najboljih motociklista sveta. Nakon katastrofalnih poplava koje su pogodile istok Španije, odlučeno je da se trka premesti iz Valensije u Barselonu.
